CelestialBodies

Class SolarSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • CelestialBodies.SolarSystem

  • public class SolarSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains a List of planets, a List of stars, and a method for updating the coordinates of all of the planets and stars that are contained within the List.

      • addPlanet

        public void addPlanet(double mass,
                      double l)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Adds a planet to a List of planets
        Parameters:
        mass - mass of the planet being added
        l - angular momentum of the planet being added
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if mass is less than or equal to zero

      • simulate

        public void simulate(double t,
                     int x,
                     int y)
        A function that sets the position of the stars and planets at a specific time
        Parameters:
        t - time to indicate the position of planets and stars
        x - x position of planets and stars
        y - y position of planets and stars
